author: kpedro88
body: For the full HE upgrade in 2018, we will not combine RecHits to resemble the old (phase 0) depth segmentation scheme. However, egamma would like to retain (as much as possible) the definitions of "outer energy" and "inner energy" for CaloTowers in HE. This PR implements that, using the existing `HcalPhase` parameter (held over from 62XSLHC, so far unused in modern releases). I also added a case for tower 17, which now has 2 depths and can be treated similarly to the other towers. These diagrams show phase 0, phase 1, and "HEP17" = phase 1 combined to be as close to phase 0 as possible (though NB above caveat about tower 17 in this PR): attn: @abdoulline @igv4321 @bsunanda @Sam-Harper
title: Fix CaloTower outer energy for HE 2018
